abstract: Herman Cain recruited a seasoned operative to help him in Iowa, even as social conservatives renew their questions about his opposition to abortion rights.
snippet: Herman Cain recruited a seasoned operative to help him in Iowa, even as social conservatives renew their questions about his opposition to abortion rights.
lead_paragraph: Questions from social conservatives about whether Herman Cain opposes abortion rights under all circumstances are arising anew after an interview Wednesday evening with CNN's Piers Morgan. The issue is simmering as Mr. Cain steps up his efforts to woo Iowa's Republican caucusgoers -- many conservative Christians -- by recruiting a veteran operative to lead his campaign there.

headline.main: Amid Abortion Questions, Cain Steps Up Iowa Game
